array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_look_good_suggest
array.item: [CS_311758]_Create a comfortable environment for better sleep
[CS_311787]_Good sleep habits contribute to overall health
[CS_311788]_Let go of your worries before bed
[CS_311785]_Good sleep helps improve your work performance

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_need_improve_suggest
array.item: [CS_311735]_Avoid eating or drinking too much before bedtime
[CS_311734]_Focus on your breathing, it can help you fall sleep
[CS_311709]_Play some soft music to lull you to sleep
[CS_311710]_Exercise regularly to improve the quality of your sleep

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_very_good_suggest
array.item: [CS_311614]_Embrace each new day with a refreshed body and mind
[CS_311611]_A regular sleeping schedule can help boost your energy levels
[CS_311612]_A good night's sleep will help you tackle tomorrow's challenges
